title: Tired of Marksmans with guns/crossbows?
body: How about an ADC with some other long ranged weapon? I have an idea for a teenage/child character who uses Yo-yos as their weapon. I'm glad Kalista has spears as her weapon, it's a nice change from the others.

Lore answer: Most likely Runic Weaponry. Draven's axes, for example, have runes embedded upon them that allow them to return to Draven's hands after he throws'em.

Meta answer: Because people already bitch when slightly different champions with slightly new mechanics are released, so I can't imagine the rage it would ensue to have a marksman that has to recover her weapon every time she AAs.
